biotools.summary: ELaSTIC is a software suite for a rapid identification and clustering of similar sequences from large-scale biological sequence collections. At its core is an efficient MinHash-based strategy to detect similar sequence pairs without aligning all sequences against each other.

bioschemas.name: ELaSTIC
bioschemas.summary: ELaSTIC is a software suite for a rapid identification and clustering of similar sequences from large-scale biological sequence collections. At its core is an efficient MinHash-based strategy to detect similar sequence pairs without aligning all sequences against each other.
